name: On That Day
topics: When a user selects a day from the calendar, they are presented with a movie that was released on that day, plus three notable events that occured on that same day.

name: Actors and Movies
topics: This is a web application that allows users to browse information about movies and actors.

name: Weather Dashboard
topics: This application shows the current weather forecast of a given city and also the 5 day weather forecast of the same city.

name: Password Generator
topics: Using this application, one can generate a random password based on the criteria that they have chosen

name: Horiseon Website Challenge
topics: This website was refactored to make it more accessible.

name: Coding Quiz
topics: Timed multiple-choice quiz application on Javascript fundamentals.
